definition: gun cylinder/external barrel of a gun
gun/firearm/rifle/spear/thing with shape or function similar to a gun/CL:支[zhi1],把[ba3],桿|杆[gan3],條|条[tiao2],枝[zhi1]/to substitute for another person in a test/to knock/classifier for rifle shots
tube/cylinder/to encase in sth cylindrical (such as hands in sleeves etc)

sentences.english: He took careful aim, squinting down the rifle barrel.
sentences.chinese: 他順着槍筒眯着眼睛，認真瞄準靶子。

sentences.english: He took careful aim,squinting down the rifle barre.
sentences.chinese: 他順着槍筒眯着眼睛，認真瞄準靶子。

sentences.english: I took the gun, lifted it to my shoulder and sighted down the black barrel.
sentences.chinese: 我拿起槍，舉上肩，黑色槍筒向下瞄準。
